statements: DELETE FROM software_updates WHERE software_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM software_updates WHERE software_name = 'AppA' AND version = '1.0';
DELETE FROM software_updates WHERE update_id = 101 AND release_date = '2021-10-15';
DELETE FROM patches WHERE patch_description LIKE '%security%'
DELETE FROM software_updates WHERE version_number = '1.2' AND software_name = 'App X'
DELETE FROM patches WHERE patch_id = (SELECT MAX(patch_id) FROM patches);
DELETE FROM system_patches WHERE system_id = 1 AND patch_id = 2;
DELETE FROM system_software WHERE system_id = 1 AND software_name = 'SoftwareA';
DELETE FROM system_patches WHERE system_id = 2 AND patch_id = 3;
